title: BRIEF-SemGroup Qtrly Earnings Per Share $0.03
text: February 26, 2018 / 12:17 PM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-SemGroup Qtrly Earnings Per Share $0.03 Reuters Staff Feb 26 (Reuters) - Semgroup Corp: * SEMGROUP REPORTS HIGHER FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR 2017 * SAYS EXPECTS FULL-YEAR 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA TO BE BETWEEN APPROXIMATELY $385 MILLION AND $415 MILLION * SAYS FORECASTING 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES OF $350 MILLION, INCLUDING APPROXIMATELY $40 MILLION RELATED TO MAINTENANCE PROJECTS * QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.03‍​ * QUARTERLY REVENUES $606.81 MILLION VERSUS $402.2 MILLION * ‍BOARD APPROVED A QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND OF $0.4725 PER SHARE, RESULTING IN AN ANNUALIZED DIVIDEND OF $1.89 PER SHARE​ * SAYS IS TARGETING AT LEAST A 5 PERCENT ANNUAL DIVIDEND GROWTH RATE THROUGH 2019​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
